Package com.hector.engine.event

Class EventSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hector.engine.systems.AbstractSystem
      • com.hector.engine.event.EventSystem
  • public class EventSystem
extends AbstractSystem
    Class handling all event related stuff. From executing events to adding eventhandlers.
    Author:
    HectorPeeters

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      EventSystem()
      The constructor sets the name and priority of the system.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void destroy()
      Cleans up all queues and maps and unsubscribes all listeners.
      void init()
      The init method loads all config variables and sets up the queue.
      static void publish​(java.lang.Object message)
      Adds an event to the event queue.
      static void publishImmediate​(java.lang.Object message)
      Immediately published an event to all relevant listeners.
      static void subscribe​(java.lang.Object listener)
      Subscribes a listener to a certain event types.
      static void unsubscribe​(java.lang.Object listener)
      Unsubscribes an object of all events.
      void update​(float delta)
      Every frame messages will be popped of the queue and published.

      • EventSystem

        public EventSystem()
        The constructor sets the name and priority of the system.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        The init method loads all config variables and sets up the queue.
        Specified by:
        init in class AbstractSystem

      • update

        public void update​(float delta)
        Every frame messages will be popped of the queue and published. If during this frame, the maxEventsPerFrame limit is reached it stops processing events for now.
        Overrides:
        update in class AbstractSystem
        Parameters:
        delta - Not used

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Cleans up all queues and maps and unsubscribes all listeners.
        Specified by:
        destroy in class AbstractSystem

      • publishImmediate

        public static void publishImmediate​(java.lang.Object message)
        Immediately published an event to all relevant listeners.
        Parameters:
        message - The event to be published

      • publish

        public static void publish​(java.lang.Object message)
        Adds an event to the event queue. This also checks if the maxQueueSize is reached.
        Parameters:
        message - The event to add to the queue

      • subscribe

        public static void subscribe​(java.lang.Object listener)
        Subscribes a listener to a certain event types. It looks for all Handler annotations and fetches the event type from the parameters of the method.
        Parameters:
        listener - The object which contains Handler annotated methods

      • unsubscribe

        public static void unsubscribe​(java.lang.Object listener)
        Unsubscribes an object of all events.
        Parameters:
        listener - The object ot unsubscribe
